issue.title: [R] Remove CLI hack from Valgrind test
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13433](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13433). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Now that CLI 3.0.1 is available on CRAN, the fix https://github.com/r-lib/cli/pull/312/files has been released.
